data.author: null
data.description: Murdered Turkish radio DJ Koray Alpergin, 43, told his sobbing girlfriend 'be quiet my love' before she was beaten unconscious by a gang of kidnappers who went on to hill him, a court heard.
data.title: Turkish radio DJ 'who was kidnapped and tortured to death' told his sobbing girlfriend 'be quiet my love' before she was beaten unconscious by gang, court hears

data.author: null
data.description: Minnesota's new head of marijuana regulation Erin Dupree, 43, stepped down from her $151,505-a-year post amid the claims she broke the marijuana regulations she was hired to oversee.
data.title: Minnesota's newly-appointed marijuana chief Erin Dupree is forced to resign over claims she sold edibles double the strength of legal limit

data.author: reporters@dailyrecord.co.uk (Ryan Thom)
data.description: Emergency services raced to the scene around 5.27pm this evening
data.title: Huge fire rips through Ayr's crumbling Station Hotel sparking huge emergency response
